description.p: One fateful day, you were dragged to one of the nine layers of the hells to fend for yourself, by means of a futile attempt to live on your own, being forced into servitude by the Infernal, or other means. By some miracle, you endured and survived in your time there and managed to escape, returning to a more pleasant realm and living to tell the tale of the harshness and despair that transpired.

ul.li: Languages: Infernal, One of your choice
Equipment: A token of your time in the hells (such as a trophy of a prized kill or a stone from a place you travelled to), a hellweave tent, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp
